title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Copilot billing documentation and renamed files for clarity (e.g., `understanding-and-managing-requests-in-copilot.md` to `requests-in-github-copilot.md`).
Added `sidebarLink` frontmatter for custom sidebar navigation links in category pages.
Implemented `spotlight` frontmatter to define featured articles with images on category landing pages.
Fixed circular links in CodeQL CLI documentation generation.
Removed authentication headers from REST code samples for unauthenticated endpoints.
Improved logging: replaced `morgan` with a custom logger using `async_hooks` for context and added log levels.
Ensured homepage group names use translated versions.
summary:
- Updated Copilot billing documentation and renamed files for clarity (e.g., `understanding-and-managing-requests-in-copilot.md` to `requests-in-github-copilot.md`).
- Added `sidebarLink` frontmatter for custom sidebar navigation links in category pages.
- Implemented `spotlight` frontmatter to define featured articles with images on category landing pages.
- Fixed circular links in CodeQL CLI documentation generation.
- Removed authentication headers from REST code samples for unauthenticated endpoints.
- Improved logging: replaced `morgan` with a custom logger using `async_hooks` for context and added log levels.
- Ensured homepage group names use translated versions.
generated_title: Enhance documentation features and logging for Copilot, REST, and CodeQL

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated Copilot billing documentation and renamed files for clarity (e.g., `understanding-and-managing-requests-in-copilot.md` to `requests-in-github-copilot.md`).
- Added `sidebarLink` frontmatter for custom sidebar navigation links in category pages.
- Implemented `spotlight` frontmatter to define featured articles with images on category landing pages.
- Fixed circular links in CodeQL CLI documentation generation.
- Removed authentication headers from REST code samples for unauthenticated endpoints.
- Improved logging: replaced `morgan` with a custom logger using `async_hooks` for context and added log levels.
- Ensured homepage group names use translated versions.

### Title
Enhance documentation features and logging for Copilot, REST, and CodeQL
